channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-17006] Add names to threads for better debugability of thread dumps
item.summary: Add names to threads for better debugability of thread dumps

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: ignore the first patch. I should reduce thread name size for better readability.
Yeah, removed. My editor is extra enthusiastic about imports, happened before, now i am trying to build habit of just greping for just the imports before uploading, but forgot this time.
Can you please push to all branches. Seems pretty useful for debugging.

-1 overall
